value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to clone web apps using Azure App Services. value.title: How to deploy an Azure Web App using only the CLI tool | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to successfully deploy an Azure Web App by using only the command-line (CLI) tool.
